parameters.sqlQuery:
MERGE `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.bookings` T
USING `victims-of-ink-data-platform.voi_warehouse.bookings_stage` S
ON T.BOOKING_ID = S.BOOKING_ID

WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET
    APPOINTMENT_ID = S.APPOINTMENT_ID,
    LOCATION_ID = S.LOCATION_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CLIENT_ID = S.CLIENT_ID,
    SERVICE_ID = S.SERVICE_ID,
    CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CANCELLED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID = S.CANCELLED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    SCHEDULED_DATE = S.SCHEDULED_DATE,
    CREATED_DATE = S.CREATED_DATE,
    SCHEDULED_TIME = S.SCHEDULED_TIME,
    START_TIME = S.START_TIME,
    END_TIME = S.END_TIME,
    APPOINTMENT_SLOT = S.APPOINTMENT_SLOT,
    DURATION_MINUTES = S.DURATION_MINUTES,
    CANCELLED_DATE = S.CANCELLED_DATE,
    LOCATION = S.LOCATION,
    TEAM_MEMBER = S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    CLIENT = S.CLIENT,
    CLIENT_GENDER = S.CLIENT_GENDER,
    CATEGORY = S.CATEGORY,
    SERVICE = S.SERVICE,
    SKU = S.SKU,
    CREATED_BY = S.CREATED_BY,
    CANCELLED_BY = S.CANCELLED_BY,
    IS_REQUESTED = S.IS_REQUESTED,
    APPOINTMENT_REF = S.APPOINTMENT_REF,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL = S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    STATUS = S.STATUS,
    IS_CANCELLED = S.IS_CANCELLED,
    IS_NO_SHOW = S.IS_NO_SHOW,
    IS_ONLINE = S.IS_ONLINE,
    CANCELLATION_REASON = S.CANCELLATION_REASON,
    APPOINTMENT_TYPE = S.APPOINTMENT_TYPE,
    GROSS_SALE = S.GROSS_SALE,
    DISCOUNTS = S.DISCOUNTS,
    NET_SALE = S.NET_SALE,
    FEES_CHARGED = S.FEES_CHARGED,
    UPFRONT_PAYMENTS = S.UPFRONT_PAYMENTS,
    APPOINTMENTS_REVIEWED = S.APPOINTMENTS_REVIEWED,
    AVG_APPOINTMENT_REVIEW_RATING = S.AVG_APPOINTMENT_REVIEW_RATING,
    APPOINTMENT_NOTES = S.APPOINTMENT_NOTES,
    _loaded_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (
    BOOKING_ID,
    APPOINTMENT_ID,
    LOCATION_ID,
    TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CLIENT_ID,
    SERVICE_ID,
    CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    CANCELLED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    SCHEDULED_DATE,
    CREATED_DATE,
    SCHEDULED_TIME,
    START_TIME,
    END_TIME,
    APPOINTMENT_SLOT,
    DURATION_MINUTES,
    CANCELLED_DATE,
    LOCATION,
    TEAM_MEMBER,
    CLIENT,
    CLIENT_GENDER,
    CATEGORY,
    SERVICE,
    SKU,
    CREATED_BY,
    CANCELLED_BY,
    IS_REQUESTED,
    APPOINTMENT_REF,
    APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    STATUS,
    IS_CANCELLED,
    IS_NO_SHOW,
    IS_ONLINE,
    CANCELLATION_REASON,
    APPOINTMENT_TYPE,
    GROSS_SALE,
    DISCOUNTS,
    NET_SALE,
    FEES_CHARGED,
    UPFRONT_PAYMENTS,
    APPOINTMENTS_REVIEWED,
    AVG_APPOINTMENT_REVIEW_RATING,
    APPOINTMENT_NOTES,
    _loaded_at
  )
  VALUES (
    S.BOOKING_ID,
    S.APPOINTMENT_ID,
    S.LOCATION_ID,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.CLIENT_ID,
    S.SERVICE_ID,
    S.CREATED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.CANCELLED_BY_TEAM_MEMBER_ID,
    S.SCHEDULED_DATE,
    S.CREATED_DATE,
    S.SCHEDULED_TIME,
    S.START_TIME,
    S.END_TIME,
    S.APPOINTMENT_SLOT,
    S.DURATION_MINUTES,
    S.CANCELLED_DATE,
    S.LOCATION,
    S.TEAM_MEMBER,
    S.CLIENT,
    S.CLIENT_GENDER,
    S.CATEGORY,
    S.SERVICE,
    S.SKU,
    S.CREATED_BY,
    S.CANCELLED_BY,
    S.IS_REQUESTED,
    S.APPOINTMENT_REF,
    S.APPOINTMENT_CHANNEL,
    S.STATUS,
    S.IS_CANCELLED,
    S.IS_NO_SHOW,
    S.IS_ONLINE,
    S.CANCELLATION_REASON,
    S.APPOINTMENT_TYPE,
    S.GROSS_SALE,
    S.DISCOUNTS,
    S.NET_SALE,
    S.FEES_CHARGED,
    S.UPFRONT_PAYMENTS,
    S.APPOINTMENTS_REVIEWED,
    S.AVG_APPOINTMENT_REVIEW_RATING,
    S.APPOINTMENT_NOTES,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
  );
